sentences.sContent: A largely Protestant nation that can trace its theological taproot to Martin Luther ought to know better.
sentences.sContent_eng: A largely Protestant nation that can trace its theological taproot to Martin Luther ought to know better.
sentences.sCn: 作为一个主要由新教徒构成的国家，有必要了解到它的神学根源来自于马丁·路德。

trans.tranOther: the large main root of a plant, from which smaller roots grow
